title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 4 Picks and Betting Breakdown
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 4 Picks and Betting Breakdown
description:
Colin gives the Action Network CCO Chad Millman his favorite picks for NFL Week 4 and finds out if they're sharp or square. They dissect Panthers/Cowboys (11:00), Colts/Dolphins (14:00), their "disgusting" Titans/Jets pick (16:00), Cardinals/Rams (21:00), the "100% sharp" pick for Giants/Saints (25:00), Ravens/Broncos (27:00), why they differ on Steelers/Packers (31:00), Raiders/Chargers (33:00), Buccaneers/Patriots (36:00), and then Chad goes off on Colin for picking Colts/Dolphins instead of Browns/Vikings (40:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
